Name: Temperature Definition: Lesson for Kids
Subject: ['food and drink', 'cuisines', 'desserts and baking', 'food']
Description: Whether it's a bite of hot soup, the cool waters of the ocean, or a fever when we are sick, temperature is a part of our everyday lives. In this lesson, you'll learn all about temperature.
